name: TPA_labor_del_Lead_Engineer_Effort_off_on_site
action:
<*ASSIGNVALUE(TPA_labor_del_Lead_Engineer_Effort:<* Round(<* Eval(<*CTX( Math.Maximum(<* Roundup(<* Eval(<*VALUE(TPA_labor_para_cst_leadeng)*>*(<*VALUE(TPA_labor_del_Block_Engineering_finalhr)*>+<*VALUE(TPA_labor_del_HMI_Engineering_finalhr)*>)) *>,0) *>,[IF]([NEQ](<*VALUE(TPA_Count_of_application_blocks_in_department)*>,TestValue)){<*VALUE(TPA_labor_para_cst_wptpas)*>}{0}[ENDIF]) )*>*<*VALUE(TPA_labor_para_cst_leadofst)*>) *>,2) *>)*>

<*ASSIGNVALUE(TPA_labor_del_Lead_Engineer_Effort_OnSite:<* Eval(<* Round(<* Eval(<*CTX( Math.Maximum(<* Roundup(<* Eval(<*VALUE(TPA_labor_para_cst_leadeng)*>*(<*VALUE(TPA_labor_del_Block_Engineering_finalhr)*>+<*VALUE(TPA_labor_del_HMI_Engineering_finalhr)*>)) *>,0) *>,[IF]([NEQ](<*VALUE(TPA_Count_of_application_blocks_in_department)*>,TestValue)){<*VALUE(TPA_labor_para_cst_wptpas)*>}{0}[ENDIF]) )*>*<*VALUE(TPA_labor_para_cst_addleadonst)*>) *>,2) *>+<* Round(<* Eval(<*VALUE(TPA_Commissioning_site_support_days_required_on_top_standard_migration_activities)*>*12) *>,2) *>) *>)*>
